layout.title: AI Receptionist
layout.description: Never miss a call again with our AI receptionist. Answers calls 24/7, books appointments, answers questions, and sounds completely human. Perfect for spas and massage businesses.

hero.title: 24/7 AI Receptionist For Your Thai Massage Business
hero.text: Never miss another booking. Your AI receptionist answers calls and messages instantly—even during treatments and after hours. Professional service, 24/7.

services.title: Perfect English Service, Zero Missed Enquiries, Massive Savings

items.title: Eliminate Language Barriers Completely
items.text: Perfect English (or German, Italian, Spanish) responses across calls, messages, and chat while you manage your business in Thai. Professional customer communication without the stress of language difficulties.

items.title: Never Miss Another Enquiry
items.text: Every missed call, unanswered message, or ignored chat is lost revenue. Your AI responds instantly to every enquiry—phone, Facebook, SMS, website—even during peak hours when you're busy with treatments.

items.title: No Receptionist Costs or Staff Headaches
items.text: Professional service across all channels without salary, taxes, holidays, sick days, or scheduling complications. Reinvest those thousands of pounds annually into growing your business instead.

features.boxText: Speaks Perfect English So You Don't Have To
features.title: Professional Communication, Fully Automated
features.text: Handles calls, messages, and enquiries across all platforms. Pre-trained on your business, answers customer questions accurately, and guides them to book appointments—all without your involvement.

items.title: Answers Every Phone Call Instantly
items.text: No more missed calls, voicemails, or busy signals. Every call gets answered professionally in seconds—even when you're treating clients, at lunch, or after closing time.

items.title: Responds to Messages Across All Platforms
items.text: Handles Facebook Messenger, SMS texts, Google Business messages, and website chat simultaneously. Every message gets an instant, professional response—no customer waits for answers.

items.title: Guides Customers to Book Appointments
items.text: Provides service details, pricing, and availability information, then directs customers seamlessly to your online booking system. Turns inquiries into confirmed appointments without your involvement.

items.title: Natural-Sounding AI Voice
items.text: Speaks clearly and professionally with natural conversation flow. Much better than robotic phone systems—understands questions, provides helpful answers, and creates a positive first impression for your business.

items.title: Knows Your Business Inside-Out
items.text: Pre-trained on your services, pricing, policies, and location details. Answers specific questions accurately—from treatment descriptions to opening hours—like an experienced staff member.

items.title: Works 24/7, Never Takes a Break
items.text: Answers calls and messages at midnight, on Sundays, during holidays—whenever customers reach out. Captures bookings competitors miss because they close at 5pm or take weekends off.
